insert_channel {"id": 1, "user_id": 1, "name": "foobar", "prefix": "+", "bot_name": "hortbot", "active": true}

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :+command add pan FOUND THE (_PARAMETER_CAPS_), HAVE YE?
send hortbot #foobar [HB] command pan added, restricted to subscribers and above

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :+pan working command
send hortbot #foobar [HB] FOUND THE WORKING COMMAND, HAVE YE?

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :+PaN working command
send hortbot #foobar [HB] FOUND THE WORKING COMMAND, HAVE YE?
